config.name: Trading Robot Plug
config.hero_headline: Join the Waitlist for AI-Powered Trading Robots
config.hero_subheadline: We're building and testing trading robots in real-time. Join the waitlist to get early access when we launch—watch our swarm build live.
config.urgency_text: Limited early access spots—join now to be first in line
config.contact_form_intro: Join the waitlist for early access to our trading robots.
config.contact_form_note: We'll notify you when we launch and give you priority access.
config.target_audience: Traders and investors interested in AI-powered trading automation
config.pain_points: Manual trading, emotional decision-making, lack of consistent strategy
config.desired_outcome: Automated trading, consistent strategy, early access to tested robots
